content.description:
You will listen to a selection in Japanese. After listening to the selection, choose the response that is best according to the selection.

Radio broadcast (Selection plays one time.)
content.question: What advice does Ms. Suzuki give for a longer life?

choices.label: Make 80% of your diet consist of fish.
Stop eating before you are completely full.

content.answer: Stop eating before you are completely full.

unit.text: 5: Factors That Impact the Quality of Life

skill.text: Skill 3.B: Interpret the meanings of a text.
